Package edu.mills.tabletopbuddy

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Game
    Gets and sets the board game properties to be called by in LibraryDBUtilities.
    GameDetailActivity
    The game's details are displayed, enabling a user to view it's properties.
    LibraryDBUtilities
    Allows for methods to query the database for a game, add or remove a game.
    MainActivity
    The top-level activity for Tabletop Buddy.
    MyLibraryActivity
    Fetches games added to a local database and populates the view of a personal library in alphabetical order.
    RandomGameActivity
    Enables a user to randomly select a game from their local library, by choosing constraints.
    SearchResultsActivity
    Performs a query to the BGG server database by name using BGG client API.
    SQLiteMyLibraryDatabaseHelper
    A local SQLite database for inserting into and deleting games from a local library.
